des:
Your smart home’s comfort is just a voice command away! You can seamlessly control your Lux Smart Thermostat’s temperature, energy reports, and scheduling with Alexa voice assistant to adjust your comfort from anywhere in your home – even from the couch with Zero Degrees of Difficulty. 

To get started, enable the Alexa skill and seamlessly connect to your Lux account. Then, discover your Lux Smart thermostat by saying "Alexa, discover devices" or by pressing the Discover Devices button in the Alexa app. Once your thermostat has been discovered, you can control your Lux Smart thermostat with simple commands like these:

- Alexa, set Living Room to 73 degrees.
- Alexa, decrease Downstairs by 2 degrees.
- Alexa, increase Upstairs by 3 degrees.

 To see your energy reports, don't forget to take advantage of the new Lux App with enhanced features to make your experience even more user friendly. 

If you have any problems linking your Lux account, please contact us at onlinesupport@luxproducts.com.
